ygData.subject: RE: even more on armor
ygData.msgSnippet: Ok Issue here.. Well being the ever constant web surfer I am (you wouldn t believe how much of my job involves waiting for the network to fail).. Anyway I
ygData.messageBody:
Ok Issue here.. Well being the ever constant web surfer I am (you wouldn't
believe how much of my job involves waiting for the network to fail)..
Anyway I found this on the Dark Forged Greaves..

http://everquest.gamestats.com/equipment/graphics6/Darkforge_Greaves.htm

WTF??? AC11 (Nice, not as nice as Rubi, but higher than my S.P.) but STA +9
MR +3???

Ok either the BP had the wrong stats or this is completely fu**ed...

Anybody have a ss of the BP or a sure way to verify?



-----Original Message-----
From: Grant Vanderhule [mailto:vandergm@...]
Sent: Monday, October 18, 1999 4:01 PM
To: shadowknight@onelist.com
Subject: [shadowknight] more on armor


From: Grant Vanderhule <vandergm@...>

hmm. i got a left vambrace and a visor last night, killed 3 crusaders today,
and no nothing :(

that seems odd tho.. why would the bracers be red when the rest of the armor
seems to be black? at least our bracers dont right out suck like everybody
elses.. and i sure cant argue with big quest xp when i'm in the middle of
lvl 40 ;)

Beld Demonblade
Fennin Ro
